segments.text: There’s something almost comical about the boy’s struggle to reach the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He looks so determined, but I can’t shake this feeling of impending danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the girl’s eager face, her raised hand an invitation for the boy to share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It makes me think about how often kids can get lost in their own little worlds.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the thought of that stool tipping sends a chill down my spine.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish I could just tell them to stop and let their mother know about the mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Instead, I’m left standing here, a silent observer of this playful rebellion.
segments.speaker: PAR
